Introduction

Liu Yangyang is a Taiwanese-German rapper, dancer, and songwriter under SM Entertainment. He is best known as a member of the boy group NCT. He is also best known as the main rapper and lead dancer of the group's subunits WayV and NCT U.

Previously, Yangyang was a trainee in SM Entertainment and has been introduced through SMROOKIES on July 17 , 2018.
